categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Captain Rigel was a Human male who served in the Imperial Conquest Consolidation Corps of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War.

Stationed on Balmorra, he was looking for the best Sith, agents, and guns-for-hire in the galaxy in order to defeat the Balmorran resistance. He sent an Imperial individual to meet with Lieutenant Davrill.
